title: Topics in International Business
description: Introduces advanced topics of special interest in international business. Instructional methods include face-to-face lecture, case presentations, assigned readings, and group discussions. May be taken for credit four times, for a maximum of sixteen units if the topics are significantly different. Students may not earn credit for both MGT 443 and MGT 229 when the course subtitles are the same. Prerequisites: MBA student or consent of instructor and department stamp.
